review: HBO Go, Netflix, games, what more could you want! I like it better than the Chromecast for a college dorm! We use a router installed in our living room to connect it to the internet instead of logging onto the university Wi-Fi.

review: good for mirroring my kindle fire

review: Could not find apps that I wanted. MLS app plus a few more,and cannot watch sling for an example in more than one at time.I can  have on roku on different rooms,no trouble.
